Submission has been resubmitted for review.
You are about to initiate a review for this submission. Files that are part of the submission are listed below and can be selected for review.

You are about to create a new review round for this submission. Files that have not been used in other review rounds are listed below. By default, the reviewers from the previous review round have been selected to participate in this new review round.

All author, reviewer and editor revision files are available from the Revisions section; only documents included in this section will be available to be passed on to later steps of the submission workflow process.

Any submission files that were chosen for inclusion in this review round are available below. Additional review files can be uploaded (and current files replaced) by clicking the Manage Review Files link.

Reviewers can be assigned to this submission by clicking the Add Reviewer link below. You are able to choose amongst a pool of already-enrolled reviewers; enrol new users as reviewers; add a personal message to the review request; set response and review due dates; and choose the review type (blind; double-blind; open). Once reviewers are assigned, you can contact them and revise their due dates by clicking the box next to their name. You will be notified of completed reviews, and can access the reviews by clicking on the reviewer's name.
Include all files from all accessible workflow stages.

To add a participant to this stage of the submission, select a user group from the drop-down menu, then add a user.

Note: The user will be added to all stages for which this user group is assigned.
You are about to remove this participant from all stages. If the user also have pending auditor tasks, they will be removed too.
You must select a user group.
You must select a user for the specified user group.

Welcome to the submission's editorial stage. All approved submission revisions from previous review stages are available in the Final Draft section. Copyedited files may be uploaded to the Copyediting section, and authors and/or editors may be assigned to audit the copyedited files. Final copyedited files may then be uploaded to the Fair Copy section, at which point the submission can then be sent to the Production stage.
All approved submission revisions from previous review stages are available below. New draft files can be uploaded (and current files replaced) by clicking the Manage Final Draft Files link.

Copyedited files may be uploaded below. Once uploaded, Authors and other participants assigned to the submission may be asked to audit the uploaded copyediting file(s). Multiple files may be sent for auditing, and an auditing due date can be set. You will be notified of completed audits, and can access the audits by clicking on the participant's name. Finally, you will be able to sign off as copyeditor on the audited copyedit file.
Final copyedited files may be uploaded to the Fair Copy section, at which point the submission (and any uploaded fair copies) can be sent to the Production stage.

Welcome to the submission's production stage. All approved and copyedited submission files from the editorial stage are available in the Production Ready section. The entirety of the submission's information -- including submission placement, metadata, contributors, chapters, and so on -- can be reviewed and edited in the Metadata section. Different formats (digital, hardback, paperback/softback) can be configured for this submission in the Publication Formats section; once these formats are configured, proofs can be uploaded for auditing and final editorial review.

All approved and copyedited submission files from the editorial stage are available in the Production Ready section. New production ready files can be uploaded (and current files replaced) by clicking the Upload a Production Ready File link.

The submission's metadata and other information can be finalized below. This submission can be published by indicating that you approve that the current metadata can be displayed on the site, below. Different publication formats, such as hardcover, softcover and digital, can be uploaded in the Publication Formats section below as well.

Add one or more publication formats here. Any publication format you add (eg. hardback; softback/paperback; digital; audio) will be listed at the bottom of the page. You will be able to upload final galley proofs for each publication format, and audit and approve them. If you are using the PayPal payment method (or similar) to sell books online, any approved proofs will be available in the Catalog Entry interface for pricing.

Multiple reviewers can be assigned and provided access to review files (managed below); new review rounds can be initiated by clicking the New Review Round tab; and all reviewer, author and editor revisions for this review stage can be managed at the bottom of the page. Additional review stage decisions are also available at the bottom of the page.
